SUBJECT
THE BUDGET
IconfidentW]
THE CHANCELLOR OF THE EXCHEQUER informed the Cabinet of the proposals in
his forthcoming Budget.
In accordance with precedent, details are not recorded in the Cabinet
Conclusions.
The Cabinet -
^"CvTook note, with approval, of the Chancellor of the Exchequer's
>^\Budget proposals.
